attributes.name: cn
attributes.description: common name(s) for which the entity is known by

attributes.name: departmentNumber
attributes.description: identifies a department within an organization

attributes.name: displayName
attributes.description: preferred name to be used when displaying entries

attributes.name: distinguishedName
attributes.description: distinguished name for which the entity is known by

attributes.name: employeeNumber
attributes.description: numerically identifies an employee within an organization

attributes.name: employeeType
attributes.description: type of employment for a person

attributes.name: givenName
attributes.description: first name(s) for which the entity is known by

attributes.name: initials
attributes.description: initials of some or all of names, but not the surname(s).

attributes.name: ou
attributes.description: organizational unit this object belongs to

attributes.name: preferredLanguage
attributes.description: preferred written or spoken language for a person

attributes.name: sn
attributes.description: last (family) name(s) for which the entity is known by

attributes.name: st
attributes.description: state or province which this object resides in

attributes.name: accountFlags
attributes.description: List of the flags enabled on an account

attributes.name: msDS-PrincipalName
attributes.description: Name of the entity in the format "NetBIOS domain name\sAMAccountName"

attributes.name: userPrincipalName
attributes.description: The unique name of the entity within the domain, in the format "name@domain"

attributes.name: cn
attributes.description: common name(s) for which the entity is known by

attributes.name: distinguishedName
attributes.description: distinguished name for which the entity is known by

attributes.name: ou
attributes.description: organizational unit this object belongs to

attributes.name: msDS-PrincipalName
attributes.description: Name of the entity in the format "NetBIOS domain name\sAMAccountName"

connectorAttributes.source-config:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><Form xmlns="http://www.sailpoint.com/xsd/sailpoint_form_1_0.xsd" name="Active Directory" connectorName="Active Directory - Direct" type="SourceConfig" directConnect="true" status="released">
  <Field name="cloudAuthEnabled" type="boolean" hidden="true" defaultValue="true"/>
  <Section layout="horizontal">
    <Section label="CONNECTION_CREDS" layout="horizontal">
      <Field name="user" type="String" required="true"/>
      <Field name="password" type="password"/>
    </Section>
    <Section label="SERVER_HOST" layout="horizontal">
      <Field name="host" type="Hostname" required="true"/>
      <Field name="port" type="PortNumber" defaultValue="389" required="true"/>
    </Section>
  </Section>
  <Section layout="horizontal">
    <Section label="GLOBAL_CATALOG_CREDS" layout="horizontal">
      <Field name="forestAdmin" type="String"/>
      <Field name="forestAdminPassword" type="password"/>
    </Section>
    <Section label="GLOBAL_CATALOG_SERVER" layout="horizontal">
      <Field name="forestGC" type="String"/>
    </Section>
  </Section>
  <Section layout="horizontal">
    <Section label="ACCOUNT_SETTINGS">
      <Field name="searchDN" type="String" required="true"/>
      <Field name="iterateSearchFilter" type="String"/>
    </Section>
    <Section label="INTEGRATION_SERVICE">
      <Button action="download" helpKey="IQ_SERVICE_DOWNLOAD_HELP" parameter="IQ_SERVICE_URL"/>
      <Section layout="horizontal">
        <Field name="useTLSForIQService" type="boolean" defaultValue="false"/>
      </Section>
      <Section layout="horizontal">
        <Field name="IQServiceHost" type="Hostname"/>
        <Field name="IQServicePort" type="PortNumber"/>
      </Section>
      <Section layout="horizontal">
        <Field name="IQServiceUser" type="String"/>
        <Field name="IQServicePassword" type="password"/>
      </Section>
    </Section>
  </Section>
  <Section layout="advanced">
    <Field name="useSSL" type="boolean"/>
    <Field name="deltaAggregation" type="boolean" required="true" defaultValue="false"/>
    <Field name="enforcePasswordPolicy" type="boolean" required="true" defaultValue="true"/>
    <Field name="buildPartialROOnAuthentication" type="boolean" required="false" defaultValue="false"/>
    <Field name="kerberosDomain" type="Hostname"/>
    <Section layout="horizontal">
      <Section label="EXCHANGE" layout="horizontal">
        <Field name="exchangeversion" type="String" defaultValue="DEFAULT" displayName="EXCHANGE_VERSION">
          <AllowedValues>
            <Option value="DEFAULT" label="NONE"/>
            <Option value="2010" label="2010"/>
            <Option value="2013" label="2013"/>
            <Option value="2016" label="2016"/>
          </AllowedValues>
        </Field>
        <Field name="ExchHost" type="Hostname" displayName="EXCHANGE_HOST"/>
      </Section>
      <Section>
        <Section label="LYNC">
          <Field name="manageLync" type="boolean" displayName="MANAGE_LYNC"/>
        </Section>
        <Section label="PROVISIONING">
          <Field name="cloudUniqueSearchDN" type="String" displayName="UNIQUE_SEARCH_DN"/>
        </Section>
      </Section>
    </Section>
  </Section>
  <StaticProperties>
    <Field name="connector_supportsPasswordSetDate" type="String" value="true"/>
  </StaticProperties>
</Form>
